verbs.description: During a phone call to the US president today , [ARGM-MNR: Theresa] [V: May] reiterated her support for the Iran nuclear deal after Mr Trump vowed powerful sanctions against the Islamic republic .

During a phone call to the US president today , Theresa May reiterated her support for the Iran nuclear deal after [ARG0: Mr Trump] [V: vowed] [ARG1: powerful sanctions against the Islamic republic] .
